validation_details.test_name: MNW1 package loading and configuration validation
validation_details.expected: 120 maximum wells with 15 active wells across 3 stress periods
validation_details.actual: MNW1 legacy system with 120 mxmnw and multi-well configuration
validation_details.description: Validates MNW1 legacy well system support and configuration

validation_details.test_name: MNW2 multi-format node data creation validation
validation_details.expected: Elevation and layer-based configuration with recarray/DataFrame support
validation_details.actual: ztop/zbotm and k/i/j methods with multi-format data compatibility
validation_details.description: Ensures flexible MNW2 well configuration and data format compatibility

validation_details.expected: ztop > zbotm ordering verification for all well nodes
validation_details.actual: Proper elevation sequence with decreasing depth validation
validation_details.description: Confirms proper well completion zone elevation specification

validation_details.expected: k index increasing with depth for layer-based configuration
validation_details.actual: Layer ordering with k=3,2,1 sequence validation
validation_details.description: Validates proper layer-based well node specification

validation_details.expected: Complex stress period data with flow rates and constraints
validation_details.actual: Multi-period pumping with 0, 100, 1000 rates and itmp=-1 reuse
validation_details.description: Ensures comprehensive pumping optimization and constraint handling

validation_details.test_name: Quality assurance and data integrity validation
validation_details.expected: Comprehensive validation and verification across all configurations
validation_details.actual: Multi-format consistency and professional QA framework
validation_details.description: Validates professional quality control and data integrity procedures
